mapper.sql: ${alias}.THEME_ID themeId, ${alias}.THEME_NAME themeName, ${alias}.THEME_TYPE themeType, ${alias} .DUE_NUM dueNum, ${alias}.DUE_UNIT dueUnit, ${alias}.COMPLAIN_PHONE complainPhone, ${alias}.HOTLINE_PHONE hotlinePhone, ${alias}.HANDLE_ADDRESS handleAddress, ${alias}.HANDLE_TIME handleTime, ${alias}.SORT_NO sortNo, ${alias}.IS_ACTIVE isActive, ${alias}.THEME_MEMO themeMemo, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ${alias}.THEME_CODE themeCode, ${alias}.THEME_ICON_CSS themeIconCss, ${alias}.SMALL_IMG_PATH smallImgPath, ${alias}.MIDDLE_IMG_PATH middleImgPath, ${alias}.BIG_IMG_PATH bigImgPath, ${alias}.HUGE_IMG_PATH hugeImgPath, ${alias}.IS_IMG_ICON isImgIcon, ${alias}.IS_MAINLINE isMainline, ${alias}.MAINLINE_ALIAS mainlineAlias, ${alias}.IS_AUXILINE isAuxiline, ${alias}.AUXILINE_ALIAS auxilineAlias, ${alias}.IS_TECHSPECTLINE isTechspectline, ${alias}.TECHSPECTLINE_ALIAS techspectlineAlias, ${alias}.GJBZSPLCLX gjbzsplclx, ${alias}.IS_ONLINE_SB isOnlineSb, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_PAR_THEME apt where apt.THEME_ID = #{id} and apt.IS_DELETED = '0' and apt.IS_ACTIVE='1'

select
,temp1.THEME_VER_ID themeVerId from AEA_PAR_THEME apt LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aptv.THEME_VER_ID, aptv.VER_NUM, aptv.THEME_ID FROM aea_par_theme_ver aptv WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM aea_par_theme_seq apts WHERE apts.MAX_NUM = aptv.VER_NUM AND apts.THEME_ID = aptv.THEME_ID ) AND aptv.IS_PUBLISH IN ('1', '2') ) temp1 ON temp1.THEME_ID = apt.THEME_ID LEFT JOIN aea_par_stage aps ON aps.THEME_VER_ID = temp1.THEME_VER_ID WHERE apt.IS_ACTIVE = '1' AND apt.IS_DELETED = '0'
and apt.IS_ONLINE_SB = #{isOnlineSb}
AND aps.DYGJBZFXFW = #{dygjbzfxfw} AND aps.IS_DELETED = '0'
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_Par_THEME ( THEME_ID, THEME_NAME, THEME_CODE, THEME_TYPE, DUE_NUM, DUE_UNIT, COMPLAIN_PHONE, HOTLINE_PHONE, HANDLE_ADDRESS, HANDLE_TIME, SORT_NO, IS_ACTIVE, THEME_MEMO, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, IS_DELETED, THEME_ICON_CSS, SMALL_IMG_PATH, MIDDLE_IMG_PATH, BIG_IMG_PATH, HUGE_IMG_PATH, IS_IMG_ICON, IS_MAINLINE, MAINLINE_ALIAS, IS_AUXILINE, AUXILINE_ALIAS, IS_TECHSPECTLINE, TECHSPECTLINE_ALIAS, GJBZSPLCLX, IS_ONLINE_SB, ROOT_ORG_ID ) values ( #{themeId}, #{themeName}, #{themeCode}, #{themeType}, #{dueNum}, #{dueUnit}, #{complainPhone}, #{hotlinePhone}, #{handleAddress}, #{handleTime}, #{sortNo}, #{isActive, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{themeMemo}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{isDeleted, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{themeIconCss}, #{smallImgPath}, #{middleImgPath}, #{bigImgPath}, #{hugeImgPath}, #{isImgIcon}, #{isMainline}, #{mainlineAlias}, #{isAuxiline}, #{auxilineAlias}, #{isTechspectline}, #{techspectlineAlias}, #{gjbzsplclx}, #{isOnlineSb}, #{rootOrgId} )
mapper.update:
update AEA_PAR_THEME
THEME_NAME = #{themeName},
THEME_TYPE = #{themeType},
DUE_NUM = #{dueNum},
DUE_UNIT = #{dueUnit},
COMPLAIN_PHONE = #{complainPhone},
HOTLINE_PHONE = #{hotlinePhone},
HANDLE_ADDRESS = #{handleAddress},
HANDLE_TIME = #{handleTime},
SORT_NO = #{sortNo},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive},
THEME_MEMO = #{themeMemo},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
THEME_CODE = #{themeCode},
THEME_ICON_CSS = #{themeIconCss},
SMALL_IMG_PATH = #{smallImgPath},
MIDDLE_IMG_PATH = #{middleImgPath},
BIG_IMG_PATH = #{bigImgPath},
HUGE_IMG_PATH = #{hugeImgPath},
IS_IMG_ICON = #{isImgIcon},
IS_MAINLINE = #{isMainline},
MAINLINE_ALIAS = #{mainlineAlias},
IS_AUXILINE = #{isAuxiline},
AUXILINE_ALIAS = #{auxilineAlias},
IS_TECHSPECTLINE = #{isTechspectline},
TECHSPECTLINE_ALIAS = #{techspectlineAlias},
GJBZSPLCLX = #{gjbzsplclx},
IS_ONLINE_SB = #{isOnlineSb},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where THEME_ID = #{themeId}
mapper.delete: update AEA_Par_THEME set IS_DELETED = '1' where THEME_ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_PAR_THEME apt where apt.THEME_TYPE = #{themeType} and apt.root_org_id=#{rootOrgId} and apt.IS_ACTIVE=1 and apt.IS_DELETED !=1

select
from aea_par_theme_ver aptv LEFT JOIN aea_par_theme apt ON aptv.THEME_ID=apt.THEME_ID where aptv.THEME_VER_ID=#{themeVerId} AND apt.IS_DELETED !=1 and aptv.IS_DELETED !=1
select max(SORT_NO) from AEA_Par_THEME where IS_DELETED = '0' and ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId}
